str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From the same as makrothumos; to be long-spirited, i.e. forbearing or patient.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To attain, obtain, acquire. From epi and tugchano; to chance upon, i.e. to attain.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.
